hero.title: AI-Powered Farming Solutions for Indian Farmers
hero.subtitle: Get real-time weather updates, crop monitoring, yield predictions, and market intelligence

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Discover how AI technology is revolutionizing Crop farming with our comprehensive suite of tools
features.weather-forecastDesc: Get accurate 7-day weather predictions to plan your farming activities
features.crop-monitoringDesc: Monitor your crops health and growth with AI-powered insights
features.disease-detectionDesc: Early detection of crop diseases using advanced image recognition
features.yield-predictionDesc: AI-powered yield predictions based on weather and crop conditions
features.market-intelligenceDesc: Real-time mandi prices and market trends for better selling decisions
features.mandi-priceDesc: Get real-time mandi prices and market data for better selling decisions

demo.title: Platform Preview
demo.subtitle: See how our platform helps farmers make informed decisions with real-time data and AI insights
demo.clickToAccess: Click to access real-time weather data, alerts, and detailed forecasts

yield.title: AI-Powered Yield Prediction for Smarter Farming
yield.subtitle: Get accurate yield insights based on weather, soil, and crop data.
yield.submitForm: Submit the form to see predictions here.
yield.increaseIrrigation: Increase irrigation this week for higher yield.
yield.rainfallAdequate: Rainfall looks adequate. Focus on nutrient management.
yield.goDirectly: Go directly to the home page.
yield.couldNotDetectLocation: Could not detect your location. You can type it manually.

monitoring.title: AI-Powered Crop Monitoring Dashboard
monitoring.subtitle: Monitor your crops' health and growth with smart insights.
monitoring.submitForm: Submit the form to see crop health.
monitoring.waterStress: Slight water stress detected due to low soil moisture.
monitoring.increaseIrrigation: Increase irrigation frequency and apply mulch this week.
monitoring.temperatureOptimal: Temperature is optimal for this growth stage.
monitoring.uploadPhoto: Upload a photo of your crop to get AI-based health feedback
monitoring.leavesHealthy: Leaves appear healthy. No visible pest infection detected.
monitoring.neemOil: Use neem oil spray for pest prevention.
